caption.p: Docking of linagliptin ( A, C) and gemigliptin ( B, D) at the SARS-CoV-2 structure 6M2N. Distances between the interacting amino acids are shown in ( A, B). Distances within the molecule of the inhibitors are shown in ( C, D). Colors indicate participation in hydrophobic interactions (yellow), pi interactions (dark yellow), hydrogen bonds (light green, polar interactions (dark green), and halogen bonds (blue).
